column1: The '''Lord of Lossarnach''' was the lord of the flowered vales of the [[White Mountains]] that lay to the south and west of [[Minas Tirith]]. Almost nothing is known of the history and descent of this title
column2: except the name of its holder during the [[War of the Ring]]. That was [[Forlong the Fat]]
column3: who rode to [[Minas Tirith]] with two hundred men from his homeland
column4: <ref>{{RK|V1}}</ref> and fell in the [[Battle of the Pelennor Fields]].<ref>{{RK|V6}}</ref> Whether Forlong left an heir to inherit his lordship is unknown.
